Technique: PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL; FORMED BY HAND
Name: Votive beads on their original string
Description: String of long tubular blue-black faience beads interspersed with small light blue disc beads, on the original cord, found among deposits of votive offerings at the principal Theban sanctuary of the goddess Hathor. The votive offerings to Hathor include apparently formless objects in which material is more important than shape. The blue colour of the beads evoke fertility and successful childbirth.
